note:
For fun I like to make little video games, read languages' wikipedia pages, play punk music on the ukulele, and wear my children as fashion accessories.

For work I make software that lets people read comic books online.

Against capitalism, prison, patricarchy, terfs, etc.

I could probably speak to you in ES, FR, NB if I tried
Would love to learn more ZH, GD, KO, LKT, NHW

He/Him.

Avatar: my face with a baby's feet wrapped around it as I dangle her (very safely) behind my back.
